channel.title: Need some helpful people?
channel.description: hi, i've always wanted my own rsps. I joined moparscape because it's full of people who know what they're doing. I'm a smart guy and catch on quickly, however i know very little about making a server. I'm thinking i need a easy 317 source and client to start with. If you have a good one or if you have any useful information to help me out feel free to message or email me. I'l be sure to give you credit when i have a running server and staff ofcourse.

item.title: Need some helpful people?
item.dc:creator: @noobs1234111 noobs1234111
item.description:
@noobs1234111 wrote:

Now, I started off with a delta source called “Dragon History” you can google “Dragon History full package” to get the downloads, It’s not a source you should use to make a private server. It’s mostly for learning perposes in my opinion. Once you get more confortable coding/programming the source and you feel you’re ready for a challenge pm me and i’ll send you a more advanced source

~Andrew

Read full topic

item.title: Need some helpful people?
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Go to the downloads section, you’d want to start with a 317. Look for one you like, download it and start to work on it.

Read full topic
